Description: The 350 Mace is a command-guided, impact-detonated torpedo with a slow flight speed and poor maneuverability. Furthermore, the launching ship must maintain a track on the target for the entire flight time, otherwise the Mace will not guide itself to the target. The Mace has a very large payload and is extremely deadly on capital-class warships and can make short work of even the heaviest of armored warships should a salvo connect. Size: 3 Cruise Speed: 130 m/s Range: 3,120 m Warhead: Type: Explosive Impact Armor Penetration: 200 cm Component Damage: 5000 hp Blast Angle: 100 Seeker: Type: Command Guided Supports TRPs: No
